name: Tile Game (KLOVATER)
description:
✦ TILE GAME: Spawn into a procedurally generated tile world, destroy anything and everything, and make millions! Buy new picks, mine equipment, and more from the shop keeper! ========================================= DIRECTIONS: ⋆ WASD to move ⋆ Click to mine ⋆ E to interact with the Shop Keeper + close the shop ⋆ Mouse scroll wheel to select items in your hotbar or click on the slot to select them ⋆ Mouse scroll wheel scroll in the shop ⋆ Space to place tiles ⋆ Click on the item's icons to sell them while in the shop ⋆ Better ores sell for more money but they spawn deeper and deeper in the world ⋆ Use ladders to get up and down your mine shafts ===============================================================

UPDATE LOG: 9/21/2022: Fixed ladder money dupe 9/21/2022: You can't mine on the loading screen 9/21/2022: Optimized torch lighting 9/23/2022: Fixed issue where if you fell away from the shop keeper while the shop was open, the game wouldn't let you close the shop 9/23/2022: You can now click on a slot to select it 10/6/2022: Added arrow key support

 ========================================= ====================✦ Pro tip: Don't eat dirt.

✦ CREDITS: ⋆ Paper Minecraft, Terraria, and Miner Cat for the idea. ⋆ @griffpatch for the base collision system ⋆ All other code and all art is made by me ========================================= Please comment below if you find any bugs!! :D =========================================
